links.title: Microsoft makes a 'crazy' bet on fuel cells to feed power-hungry data centers
links.description: The tech company is testing the use of natural gas-powered fuel cells that could someday allow data centers - which consume 2 percent of U.S. electricity - to unplug from the power grid. That could translate into big cost savings and, potentially, cuts in carbon emissions.

links.title: Huge China Auto Industry Shift Could Benefit Tesla Inc (TSLA) The Most
links.description: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) is on the verge of a potential Chinese revolution. Not in the political sense, of course. China's oppressive government is well entrenched. We're talking about a seismic shift in how foreign automakers are allowed to operate in the world's most populous country.
